submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        output = 0
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        sum_h, sum_v = sum(horizontalCut), sum(verticalCut)
        while horizontalCut and verticalCut:
            h, v = horizontalCut[-1], verticalCut[-1]
            if h > v:
                output += h
                output += sum_v
                horizontalCut.pop()
                sum_h -= h
            else:
                output += v
                output += sum_h
                verticalCut.pop()
                sum_v -= v
        output += sum_h
        output += sum_v
        return output
